posts.author: Jim Jimmerson
posts.title: The ways of Jim
posts.copy: The ways of Jim will mystify all those who know not of Jim

posts.author: Dave Davidson
posts.title: The Dudes of Dave
posts.copy: The dudes know of the Dave more than the Dave knows of the dudes, but the dudes do not know Dave

posts.author: Mary Maryson
posts.title: The Mary of Maridon
posts.copy: Mary of Maridon was one of Maridon. Maridon knew Mary well
